TopicTitle: Dont wanna get banned but can any one help ?

Articles.Content:
Hello my name is Renats does any one know how to make game in unity or could someone make for cash reply on -email removed-

Please don't report me please don't want to get banned, im no spammer but i can't find people if you know anyone pease tell them to email me here or on my gmail, i tryed youtube to no luck so far.

P.S. Im thinking to make youtube video of gameplay about KSP too just waiting till kethane mod gona be updated

Edited May 30, 2013 by KasperVld

This section of the forum is about KSP's development. If you want to make a similar game to KSP you could ask in the off topic section of the forum, but otherwise I'd find a game development forum. You're more likely to get help if you get stuck in yourself and ask specific questions though, learning how to do something is the easy bit. The hard bit is putting the time and effort into it.

Jump in and start playing around would be my advice. I'm a programmer (not game developer) and that's how I started out, as Endless has suggested get signed up to a forum more suited to overall game design/development asking on here probably won't get you very far.

Good luck.

G.

I have moved this to off-topic.

If you are really serious about wanting to make a game then I would recommend putting together a design document outlining your vision. Try get a basic model up and running if at all possible. This would show people you mean business and you never know someone might share your vision and want to collaborate.

This would show people you mean business and you never know someone might share your vision and want to collaborate.

That link needs you to be a member so that's a bit of an off put straight away, try hosting it on an open website or just a dropbox link would do. I really would suggest trying to do something your self even if its just making a small video, any knowledge you can gain yourself will only help in the long run. Instead of asking others to do it for you try do what you can, then ask for guidance. People are far more helpful to people who they see are trying, I know I am
